channel.title: Player Customizable Particle System
channel.description:
The particle base was developed by 'Avatar Realms' & I added z-buffering and integrated it into player updating.
The particle color is based on the first color of the completionist cape. I'm spawning 200 particles a second that decay from 2.0f*2.0f to 0.05f with a vector of -3 and 1/2 gravity.
The engine can also replace the particles with sprites, as you can see the $ signs in the red cape.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GKsON59.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mNrLfya.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.nearreality.com/thread/comp.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:

[quote=“arham 4, post:27, topic:553588”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=672503.msg4499664#msg4499664 date=1448764761]

Welcome to Moparscape, allow me to introduce you around. Those whom have commented regarding the ‘ugliness’ of your progress are all you will see around here. People do not bother congratulating on your abilities to achieve task. This is the reason this community is dying by the day. I come here for a day to see if something has changed and all have remained the same. You deserve some positive feedback. It may not look exactly right, as it’s a bit off, but the fact you’ve put effort into adding it is noteworthy. Keep it up!

shutup

Oh and here comes the douchebag with the ability to act above everyone else.
[/quote]shutup[/quote]

Suck it <3 Little 13 year old here

item.title: Player Customizable Particle System
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I personally think the problem isn’t with the concept, but with the particles they decided to use. It took me way too long to realize the red particles were actually little dollar signs to represent the ‘donation’ cape (because I cba to actually read the post), and that does look pretty bad. The blue cape looks fine to me and I think this looks pretty good for the revision. Good work.

Read full topic
